item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

[quote=“JoeBenton2014, post:4, topic:539868”]Or you could unblock everything.

Windows 8:
Goto start, move mouse top right then slid down, click search. Type control panel or java configure, along them lines. Open the java panel, goto the security tab, and bring the level down to the lowest it can go, Apply settings then close browser and re open. Should be all done. Ill make a tut on this[/quote]

Windows 8? I don’t like 8 I use vista on my current pc and on my laptop I have 7 ultimate but I got it thnx guys

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @JoeBenton2014 JoeBenton2014
item.description:
@JoeBenton2014 wrote:

Or you could unblock everything.

Windows 8:
Goto start, move mouse top right then slid down, click search. Type control panel or java configure, along them lines. Open the java panel, goto the security tab, and bring the level down to the lowest it can go, Apply settings then close browser and re open. Should be all done. Ill make a tut on this
